summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FindMeAgent lead capture landing page. Backend APIs working well with minor email validation issue. Frontend fully functional with excellent user experience and mobile responsiveness.

minor_bugs.issue: Email validation not strict enough - accepts invalid email formats like 'invalid-email'
minor_bugs.impact: Allows invalid email addresses to be stored in database

passed_tests: Form validation for missing required fields (422)
Landing page loads with logo and form
All form fields present with correct data-testid attributes
Form submission with valid data works
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider implementing stricter email validation in the backend LeadCreate model to reject obviously invalid email formats
success_percentage: Backend: 83.3% (5/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all core functionality working)
